content.rendered:
So, you’ve found a chip in your windshield. You probably have some questions, such as:
Do I need to fix the crack right away?
No matter how large the chip, crack or scratch to your windshield is, you should address the issue with repair or replacement. If you do not resolve the issue as soon as possible, the crack or chip may spread, affecting other parts of the windshield. What may start as a minor problem will become much larger the longer you wait.
Does the amount of damage to my windshield matter?
More minor damage can be fixed with a repair, which involves injecting a transparent resin into the chip to fill in the damaged area. Chips the size of a quarter or smaller can generally be fixed with this method, but you should check with your auto glass professional for the most effective solution. If the chip is large or in an area that obstructs the driver’s view, it is generally recommended to replace the windshield.
Do I need to bring my car in to the shop?
If it is convenient, you can drive it right to our location. However, at Frank’s Auto Glass we know you have a busy schedule, so our mobile repair service can come right to your home or office to fix the damage for you! Go through your work day at ease knowing the windshield will be fixed for you by the time you leave in the evening.
What kind of warranty is available?
We offer a one-year workmanship warranty for windshield repairs and window repairs or replacements for both new and used auto glass!
Don’t put it off; have that chip in your windshield repaired or replaced today.
